程序包 fiat.app.server

类 operator

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Thread
fiat.app.server.operator
所有已实现的接口:
Runnable
class operator extends Thread
Thread for communication with each client

  • 构造器详细资料

    • operator

      public operator​(Socket clntSock, Logger logger, ItemList list, FileWriter fWriter, File file)
      Communication operation default constructor
      参数:
      clntSock - client socket
      logger - log server issues
      list - item list
      fWriter - file write
      file - item file

  • 方法详细资料

    • run

      public void run()
      Run method
      指定者:
      run 在接口中 Runnable
      覆盖:
      run 在类中 Thread

    • handle

      public static void handle​(Socket clntSock, Logger logger, ItemList list, FileWriter fw, File file)
      main part to deal with message received from client and send to client
      参数:
      clntSock - client socket
      logger - log server issues
      list - item list
      fw - filer writer
      file - item file

    • writeItem

      public static void writeItem​(FileWriter fw, Add add, long modified, Logger logger)
      Client send a item to client, client can write the item into specific file
      参数:
      fw - File write
      add - Add message type
      modified - modified time stamp
      logger - log Server issues

    • handleInterval

      public static void handleInterval​(long time, ItemList tempList, File file) throws FileNotFoundException
      Handle Interval message
      参数:
      time - interval time stamp
      tempList - declare a item list
      file - items file
      抛出:
      FileNotFoundException - if file not exists
